content: **crochet drops neck warmer in 2 threads alpaca ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no z-627 yarn group a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l **measurements** circumference 60-65-70 cm / 23½ -25½ -27½ height 20-27-34 cm / 8 -10½ -13½ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 100 g color no 2020 light camel eco 50 g color no 0100 off white 50 g color no 3720 medium pink 50 g color no 0401 brown 50 g color no 3800 old pink drops crochet hook size 6 mm / j/10 or size needed to get 12 double_crochet x 7 row with 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
